message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can finalize the deal.
A bit more reasonable, but I'm not done negotiating yet.
Too generous to Bob. I'm willing to give up more.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm still not satisfied. I want a better deal.
Not enough for me. I'm willing to wait for a better offer.
I'm willing to split it 50/50. No more negotiations.
